mulya aadhara, loka bauddha sabhawa ha ”buddha saran” kawunsilaya ma`gin labadimata katayuthu salasini. 1951 wasare di aacharya ambedkar wisin liwimata aarambha karanu labu kruthin athara wu ”budun wahanse ha budusamaya” kruthiya 1956 di mudranaya wanne, ”budun wahanse ha unwahansege nyayan” yana namin, abhinawa parichche da dekak da sama`gini. 1956 wasare mayi masa aacharya ambedkarge deshanayak bi.bi.si. rediyowa wisin wikashaya karanu labini.
